kpi.name: hlr_141a

kpi_info.title: Send Routing Information (SRI) operations in the network
kpi_info.use: Indicates amount of Send Routing Information (SRI) operations in the network. (No counter description for m12)
kpi_info.use_experience:
This KPI is similar to mob_hlr141b. New KPI ID reference (HLR NE).
This new KPI ID reference is to to be used starting from M15.1 report sets.

RECOMMENDED SUMMARY LEVELS: Network
KPI CLASS: Mobility
MEASUREMENT(S): HLR measurement, part one (M83/53H)

kpi.kpi_alias: Send rout inf SRI op NW HLR
